short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Search for movies on various websites (Letterboxd, IMDb, TMDB, Rotten Tomatoes, and Metacritic).

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Loggd is an extension that skips searching steps and directly brings you to the page of a movie on one of various rating websites. This makes it easy to get to your film so you can review it after watching, or if you're simply checking it out. We currently support Letterboxd, IMDb, TMDB, Rotten Tomatoes, and Metacritic.
